subject: Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
Asphalt
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp
lead_paragraph: Jamie McMurray held off Dale Earnhardt Jr. on the final turn to win the race, which was delayed for hours because of a pothole.
snippet: Jamie McMurray held off Dale Earnhardt Jr. on the final turn to win the race, which was delayed for hours because of a pothole.
